entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
